name: 01 Pragma - formerly Logisy
description:
Pragma (formerly Logisy) is the most comprehensive D2C super-app that helps D2C merchants to manage their entire operations in one single place! 

Pre-purchase: Fast Checkout system, Abandoned Cart recovery, Visitor Identification
Post-purchase: Risk analysis of Orders/Users, Order notifications, NDR Management, CRM and WhatsApp Marketing 
Post-delivery: Myntra-like Returns management, Product reviews, NPS etc.
focus_areas: Fast Checkout & RTO Prevention (Return to Origin)
